title: Start
body: -> Take a closer look It looks like a sword. -> Try to pull the sword It doesn't budge. -> Try to pull the sword again Still nothing happens. The sword seems to have been stuck in the rock for years, so you decide to leave it alone. [[After sword]] -> Continue moving onwards You roll away from the sword and continue on your journey. [[After sword]] -> Ignore the sword in the rock and continue moving onwards [[After sword]] -> Continue moving onwards You roll away from the sword and continue on your journey. [[After sword]]
